Sentencas: For more than the last two decades, there has been research going on to develop advanced energy technologies involving minimum environmental pollution, to replace the conventional fossil energy systems.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are one of the most promising, eco-friendly and efficient means for the generation of electricity to meet the future energy requirements.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This research work focuses on the parametric sensitivity analysis for natural gas fueled high temperature tubular SOFC.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Firstly, for the tubular SOFC, a one-dimensional radially symmetrical model has been developed and solved using the finite-difference method.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Then, the effect of the variation of important operational and design parameters on its performance has been analyzed.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The parameters typically include composition, inlet fuel temperature, pressure, length of SOFC tube and thicknesses of its components.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The composition is expressed as steam to methane ratio and it has been observed that the voltage and power density developed by the SOFC diminishes as the ratio increases.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Further, a change in the inlet fuel pressure of the tubular SOFC has no pronounced influence on the voltage and power density developed.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: On the other hand, with an increase in the inlet fuel temperature, a small improvement in these performance characteristics is exhibited.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The axial length of the tubular SOFC does conspicuously influence its performance characteristics but solely at current densities greater than 4000A/m(2).
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An increase in the thickness of its components results in a reduction in its voltage and power density developed.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The largest decline in these performance characteristics with the increase in thickness is observed for electrolyte followed by cathode and anode respectively.
Titulo: Parametric sensitivity analysis for a natural gas fueled high temperature tubular solid oxide fuel cell
